2.「ご苦労さま <pc>。| あなたも ここに 来ていたのね。: Thanks for your efforts <pc>. I|see you've been here too.

3.「お初に お目にかかります 大神官さま。| 私は グランゼドーラ王国の王女| ア: It is a pleasure to meet you for the first|time, High Priestess. My name is Anlusia,|princess of the Kingdom of Granzedora.

4.「ほほう……。| そなたが 勇者姫アンルシアか。| して 何用があって この神殿: So... you are the valiant princess Anlusia.|And what brings you to this temple?

5.「私は レンダーシアを守護する要石……| 神の緋石を守るため ここに 参りました:
I am here to protect the keystone that guards|Rendasia, the Scarlet Stone of God. The|Scarlet Stone is now being targeted by the|
|Great Demon King.

6.「このダーマ神殿は レンダーシアにおいて| 聖なる場所と あがめられています。|: This Dharma temple is revered as a holy place|in Lendersia. Perhaps there is a scarlet stone|of God here.

7.「……むむむ。神の緋石とやらのことは知らんが| わしの見た夢と 関係があるやもし: Hmmm...hmmm. I don't know anything about the|Scarlet Stone of God, but it may have|something to do with the dream I had...

8.「この神殿の奥。天願の座と呼ばれる場所に| ダーマのご神体が 納められておる。わ:
At the back of this temple. At the back of|this temple, in a place called the Tengan no|Seat, the sacred body of Dharma is housed. I|
|dreamed that someone was destroying it.

9.「……なるほど。そのご神体こそが| 神の緋石なのかも しれません。: ...I see. Perhaps that deity is the scarlet|stone of God.

10.「どうにも その夢が気になってのう。| わしは ご神体の無事を確認するため| 天: I was curious about the dream. I was going to|go to Tengan to check on the safety of the|deity.

11.「それは ちょうど よかった。| 私と 勇者の盟友である <pc>も| 同行させ: That was just fine. Could <pc>, a|brave ally of mine and mine, please accompany|us?

12.「なんと！ この者は 勇者の盟友であったのか。: What a surprise! Was this man an ally of the|brave?

13.「私の持つ 勇者のチカラを注ぎ込むことで| 神の緋石は 神代の時代のチカラを取り:
By infusing the power of my heroic spirit, the|scarlet stone of God will regain the power of|the age of the gods and will keep evil people|
|at bay.

14.「おお。それならば 断る理由はない。| わしからも 同行をお願いしたいくらいじゃ: Oh. Then there is no reason to refuse. I would|even ask you to accompany me.

15.「天願の座の入り口を開く 祈りの儀を| すぐに とりおこなうとしよう。| 地下１:
We will soon perform the prayer ceremony to|open the entrance to the Tengan's throne.|Please make your way to the Ritual Room on the|
|first basement floor.

16.「ご協力に感謝いたします 大神官さま。| では 私たちは 儀式の間へ向かいます。: Thank you for your cooperation, High|Priestess. Now we will go to the Ritual Room.

17.「何が起こるか わからないから| <pc>にも 来てもらいたいの。| あなたも: I need you <pc> to come because I|don't know what's going to happen. I'm asking|you to stay until the ceremony too.

19.「勇者姫 それに <pc>よ。| 待たせて すまんかったのう。: Princess Brave and <pc>. Sorry for|keeping you waiting.

20.「さっそく 祈りの儀を とりおこなうでな。| おふたりは 下がっておられよ。: We will perform the prayer service|immediately. You two stay back.

23.「……おお 天よ。我は願い 我は祈る。| 我を その座に 導きたまえー。| その: O heavens! I hope and I pray. Guide me to the|throne. Let my wish be delivered to that|throne.

24.「……祈りの儀により 扉は開いた。: ...The door was opened by a prayer ceremony.

25.「それでは 天願の座へ おもむこう。| 皆の者 わしについてまいれ。: Now let us go to the throne of God's desire.|Follow me, all of you.

26.「<pc> 私たちも 行きましょう。| 神の緋石があるなら 勇者のチカラを| 注: <pc>We should go too. If there's a|scarlet stone of God, we'll have to pour our|heroic powers into it.

27.「見て <cs_pchero>。| やはり ダーマのご神体は 神の緋石だったわ。: Look <cs_pchero>. I knew Dharma's deity|was the Scarlet Stone of God. Looks like it's|still in one piece.

28.「……ああ。確かに ご神体は| 神の緋石であったようじゃな。: Ah. It seems that the deity was indeed the|scarlet stone of God.

29.「緋石の輝きが かなり落ちているわ。| 今すぐに 勇者のチカラを注ぎ込みましょう: The scarlet stone has lost much of its|brilliance. Let's pour the power of the brave|into it now.

30.「そうすれば もう大丈夫です。| 大神官さまの見た夢が 現実にならなくて| 本当: Then you will be fine now. I am so glad that|the dream you had, High Priestess, did not|come true.

31.「……それは どうでございましょうねえ？| 夢が現実となるのは これからなのです: Well...how about that? The dream is just|beginning to become a reality!

33.「まさか 勇者とその盟友を引き連れて| 神の緋石と 対面することになろうとは……:
I never thought that I would come face to face|with the scarlet stone of God with a brave man|and his allies in tow... I can say that it was|
|a happy miscalculation.

34.「神の緋石もろとも 邪魔者どもを| 亡き者にできるとは なんたる幸運！| そして: What luck to be able to make those who stood|in the way of the Scarlet Stone of God and all|the others to be dead! And what an honor!

36.「クククククッ！ 皆さま はじめまして。| 私の名は ファズマ。| 幻魔将ファズ: Kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk! Nice to meet you|all. My name is Phasma. Please call me Phasma.

37.「魔元帥ゼルドラドさまの命により| この地に隠された 神の緋石を破壊しに| 参上: I have come to destroy the Scarlet Stone of|God hidden in this land by order of the evil|marshal Zeladorado.

38.「……そんな！？ すでに 大魔王の手の者が| ダーマ神殿に 潜んでいたなんて！: ...Oh no! I can't believe that the Great Demon|Lord's handiwork was already lurking in the|Alltrades Abbey!

39.「だっ……大神官さまが 魔物に！？| うーん……。: The High Priestess has become a demon! Hmmm...

40.「変幻自在の幻術で ダーマの大神官に化け| 神の緋石のもとへ侵入する 我が計画。:
My plan to invade the High Priest of Dharma to|the Scarlet Stone of the God by means of|shapeshifting illusions. It seems to have|
|succeeded splendidly.

41.「そうと気づかず 私のお手伝いをしてくれた| おろかな方も おられましたがねえ。: Some people were foolish enough to help me|without realizing it, though.|Kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk...

42.「勇者もろとも 神の緋石を闇に葬ってしまえば| まさに 一石二鳥。大魔王マデサゴ:
Burying the Scarlet Stone of God with the|heroes in the darkness will truly kill two|birds with one stone. The great demon king|
|Madesagora will be very pleased!

43.「<cs_pchero>。| こいつを倒して 神の緋石を守るわよ！: <cs_pchero>. We'll defeat this guy and|protect God's Scarlet Stone!

44.「クックックク。威勢のよろしいことで。| しかし 残念ながら あなた方は| 速や: Kookkook. You have a lot of pomp and|circumstance. But unfortunately, you will all|die a swift death.

45.「我が幻術の冴え。とくと ご覧あれ！: The brilliance of my illusion. See for|yourself!

46.「この幻術を破らぬ限り あなた方に| 勝利など ありえないのでございます！| ク: Unless you break this illusion, there can be|no victory for you!

47.「待ちなさい！ 神の緋石を| 壊させるわけには いかないわ！！: Wait! I can't let you destroy the Scarlet|Stone of God!

48.「おや……。死にぞこないの勇者と| その盟友が 黄泉の淵から| 舞い戻ったようで: Oh... It seems that the hero of death and his|allies have returned from the depths of Hades.

49.「何度 来ようとも 同じこと。| 我が幻術を破らない限り あなた方に| 勝機など: It is the same no matter how many times you|come. Unless you break my illusion, there is|no chance for you to win.

50.「<cs_pchero>。神の緋石を 守り抜くのよ。| なんとしても こいつを倒: <cs_pchero>. Defend the Scarlet Stone of|God. Let's defeat this guy at all costs!

51.「ククククッ……。相変わらず| 威勢がよくて ほほえましいこと。| ですが 今回: But I would like to end this time!

52.「……カァァァッ！？| なんということで ございましょう！| 我が幻術が 破られ: ...Kah! Oh, my God! My illusion has been|broken!

53.「……大魔王…マデサゴーラさま。| 申し訳……あり…せんで………ござ……。: ...the great demon lord... madessagora. I|am... sorry... for... for...

54.「なんとか 倒せたわね……。| もし 私たちが来る前に 祈りの儀が| おこなわれ: We managed to beat them... if the prayer|service had taken place before we arrived, we|would have been in big trouble.

55.「それじゃ 急いで 神の緋石に| 勇者のチカラを 注ぎ込むことにしましょう。: Then let's hurry up and pour the power of the|brave into the scarlet stone of God.

56.「……これで ここの神の緋石は| 神代のチカラを取り戻したわ。| もう 大魔王に:
...With this, the scarlet stone of God here|has regained the power of the divine age. Even|the Great Demon King should no longer be able|
|to touch it.

58.「あの大神官さまは 魔物が化けていたのです。| 私たちが倒しましたので ご安心く: That High Priestess was a demon in disguise.|We defeated him, so don't worry. The scarlet|stone of God has regained its power.

59.「そうですか。あれは 魔物が……。: I see. That was a demon...

60.「では 本物の大神官さまは どこに！？| 大変だっ。探しにいかなくては！！: Then where is the real High Priestess? Oh my|God, I have to go look for him! I have to go|look for him!

61.「こんな手を使ってくるなんて| 敵も いろいろと考えるものね……。: I can't believe they would try such a trick...|the enemy has a lot of ideas...

62.「<cs_pchero>。私は この地の| 神の緋石が チカラを取り戻したことを: <cs_pchero>. I'm going back to report to|Luchenda-sama that the scarlet stone of the|god of this land has regained its power.

63.「あなたは 本物の大神官さまの無事を| 確かめにいってくれる？: Will you go make sure the real High Priestess|is okay?

64.「……ううっ 大神官さま。| 本当に ご無事で 安心しました。: ...Ugh, High Priestess. I am so relieved that|you are really safe.

65.「すまんかったのう……。| わしが 油断しておったばかりに。: I'm sorry... I was so careless.

66.「おお <pc>ではないか。| ジュアロから そなたと 勇者姫の活躍は| 聞かせ: Oh <pc>. Juaro has told me about|you and the heroic princess.

67.「……情けないところを 見せてしまったのう。| 突然 押し入ってきた魔物に 妙な:
I'm sorry to have shown you such a pitiful|scene. A demon suddenly broke into the house|and put a strange spell on me, making me|
|unable to move.

68.「その上 わしの姿が 誰にも見えぬよう| 消されておったらしく 今しがた| やっ: Moreover, my image had been erased so that no|one could see me, and only now have I finally|been found.

69.「……天願の座にある ダーマのご神体は| 神の緋石であったということじゃが| じ:
The dharma body on the throne of Tengan is|said to have been the scarlet stone of the|deity, and there is a story about this in the|
|temple.

70.「神の時代。人間の神グランゼニスと| ダーマの神は よき友人として| 親交を 深: Age of the Gods. The human god Grandzenith and|the god of Dharma were good friends and had a|close friendship.

71.「グランゼニス神が 果てたとき| そのチカラが込められた 石のひとつが| ダーマ: When the god Granzenis died, one of the stones|that contained his power was entrusted to the|god Dharma.

72.「その石が眠る山を ダーマの神は| 霊峰ダーマと名づけ 当時の神官たちに| 神殿: The god Dharma named the mountain on which the|stone lies Dharma, and had the priests of the|time build a temple...

73.「ダーマのご神体として 未来永劫| 守り続けるよう 神託を下された……。| それ: The oracle ordered that it be protected as the|sacred body of Dharma for all eternity...|That's what the legend says.

74.「……神の緋石を守ることは 本来| 我々 ダーマの神官の役目なのじゃよ。: ...It is essentially our role as priests of|Dharma to protect the scarlet stone of God.

75.「それなのに 今回は そなたたちに| 助けてもらうことに なってしまったのう。|: And yet, this time, we have to ask for your|help. We should be very sorry.

76.「<pc>よ。本当に よくやってくれた。| そなたには 礼のしようもないが| せ: <pc>. You did a really good job. I|can't thank you enough, but will you at least|accept this?

77.「勇者の盟友たる そなたの運命は| この わしにも 計り知れぬ。| ここで 無事: I do not know the fate of you, my brave|friend. I pray for your safety here.

78.「我々も 祈りましょう。| <pc>殿の 無事と旅の成功を。: Let us pray too. <pc> for your|safety and success on your journey.

79.「その後で あなたも| ルシェンダさまの所へ 戻ってきてね。| これで 神の緋石: After that, you too must come back to|Luchenda-sama. Now all of God's scarlet stones|are protected.
